mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DTN_RLTM_LCTR_PARTCPT_INFO ( LCTR_ID ,UPRISM_ID ,ADHRNC_USER_ID ,ADHRNC_USER_NM ,PARTCPT_DE ,PARTCPT_TIME ,END_TIME ,PROG_TIME ) SELECT rlpl.LCTR_ID ,rlpl.UPRISM_ID ,rlpl.UPRISM_ID AS ADHRNC_USER_ID ,rlpl.NAME AS ADHRNC_USER_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(rlpl.START_DATE,'%Y%m%d') AS PARTCPT_DE ,DATE_FORMAT(rlpl.START_DATE,'%H%i%s') AS PARTCPT_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(rlpl.END_DATE,'%H%i%s') AS END_TIME ,rlpl.PROG_TIME AS PROG_TIME FROM DTN_RLTM_LCTR_PARTCPT_LOG rlpl ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE PROG_TIME = rlpl.PROG_TIME ,END_TIME = DATE_FORMAT(rlpl.END_DATE,'%H%i%s')
